description: This PHP source file generates a webpage for configuring Wi-Fi network settings, including network name (SSID) and password, with client-side validation, password toggle functionality, and AJAX submission for saving configuration.

methods.name: click_save
methods.description: Handles the process of validating input, showing confirmation alerts, and initiating AJAX request to save Wi-Fi configuration.

methods.name: trigger_save
methods.description: Performs AJAX request to submit Wi-Fi network settings to the server and redirects upon success.

methods.name: startPing
methods.description: Checks if the gateway is accessible by pinging a specific URL and redirects to customer support page if successful.
